reviewText: Santosh (Rajpal Yadav) is a simpleton, married to Shanti (Neha Dhupia). In no time their married life becomes a mess, and they are constantly fighting with each other. A troubled Santosh finds no respite at work either, where his boss (Ashish Choudhary) keeps telling him of how wonderful his own wife (Amrita Arora) is. Truth is, she is a nag, and her husband is almost as troubled as Santosh himself.
